title: France panorama. [No. 69/17]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. Child pedagogy - the Freinet technique of expression is becoming more and moe popular. 2. Mechanical birds and useless discoveries - Paris artisans create tiny mechanical birds. 3. Woman ‘69 vintage - a short but strange, ethereal profile on women of 1969. 4. Polyconcrete art - the Saint-Maur scluptures. 5. Masters of literature - Elise and Marcel Jouhandeau.
